message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's uniqueness, but I am only able to pay up to $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise. However, I still cannot exceed $850000 for the product. I would like to keep our negotiations open, so I am making a counteroffer of $850000.

I understand that you're sticking to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet in the middle. I'll offer the product to you for $862500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and rarity.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I am still unable to exceed my budget. I am willing to pay $850000 for the product, which is my maximum limit.
